circumstances: During the takeoff roll, the right engine lost power. The pilot lost control of the airplane that veered off runway and collided with a snow bank. All three occupants were injured and the aircraft was damaged beyond repair.
probable_cause:
Powerplant failure for undetermined reason. The following contributing factors were reported:
- Failed to obtain/maintain flying speed, 
- Exercised poor judgment, 
- Airport facilities, runway lighting, 
- Engine lost power about liftoff, 
- Aircraft veered to right of runway into snow, 
- Runway light inoperative, 
- Dark,
- Ice fog in area.
